messages.subject: Re: [AlwaysLearning] Holly has this haircut...
messages.msgSnippet: Geeze, Sandra.  You could make a living doing hair.  It s amazing.  I cut my girls hair too...straight across the bangs and straight across the back!  I had
messages.messageBody:
Geeze, Sandra. You could make a living doing hair. It's amazing. I
cut my girls' hair too...straight across the bangs and straight across
the back! I had to show them how cool it was and Elysia, the 5 yr old,
saw Holly's collection of My Little Ponies in the background. She liked
Holly's hair but was REALLY impressed with so many little ponies. So if
Holly's ever looking for a buyer... HeidiC.




SandraDodd@... wrote:

>http://sandradodd.com/hollyhair
>
>Once again, Holly ordered up a haircut I feared would be a disaster (the
>backup plan was we would shave her whole head) and it was NOT a disaster.
>She has an artsiness and confidence about her I have never had.
>
>
>
>

SandraDodd@... writes:

> Once again, Holly ordered up a haircut I feared would be a disaster (the
> backup plan was we would shave her whole head) and it was NOT a disaster.
> She has an artsiness and confidence about her I have never had.

I'm as amazed that YOU did it as I am at how beautiful it is.

Tuck

messages.subject: Holly has this haircut...
messages.msgSnippet: http://sandradodd.com/hollyhair Once again, Holly ordered up a haircut I feared would be a disaster (the backup plan was we would shave her whole head) and it
messages.messageBody:
http://sandradodd.com/hollyhair

Once again, Holly ordered up a haircut I feared would be a disaster (the
backup plan was we would shave her whole head) and it was NOT a disaster.
She has an artsiness and confidence about her I have never had.


<A HREF="http://sandradodd.com/hollyhair">Holly's April 2003 Haircut</A>
